additional_media_info.title: Experts reactivated the spinal cord circuits of a paralyzed man
additional_media_info.description: Jered Chinnock has been paralyzed and unable to walk for the last five years. Now there is hope. A new therapy uses an implanted electrode to reactivate spinal cord circuits.
